from datetime import datetime

def convert_to_military(time):
    in_time = datetime.strptime(time, '')
    out_time = datetime.strftime(in_time, '%H:%M:%S')
    return out_time

from datetime import datetime

def convert_to_military(time):
    in_time = datetime.strptime(time, '%I:%M:%S %p')
    out_time = datetime.strftime(in_time, '')
    return out_time
